questions.text: How many days until Election Day?
questions.explanation:
52.

	The number of days until Election Day was shown on the screen.

questions.text: Who did CJ get to take over the planning of Ellie and Vic's wedding?
questions.explanation:
Will.

	Will had already told CJ that he was having problems with some of the plans for the wedding so when CJ had an emergency she put Will in charge of the wedding plans with Ellie and Vic.

questions.text: How many points did Josh say that Santos went up after the debate?
questions.explanation:
4.

	Vinick had a two point bump, but was saying to the press that he won the debate.

questions.text: Who said, "There's too many women in this room"?
questions.explanation:
Santos.

	Santos was amazed at the amount of women that were in his room answering questions for him and telling him things he needed to know.

questions.text: What fish did Margaret suggest Ellie have for the reception dinner?
questions.explanation:
Trout.

	Margaret suggested Ellie have trout for the reception dinner because she couldn't have salmon or tuna due to her pregnancy. Margaret also said she couldn't have brie.

African Americans.

	Lester told Lou that Santos had 81 percent of the black vote and that 12 percent was undecided.

questions.text: How many guests did the White House have for Ellie and Vic's wedding?
questions.explanation:
744.

	Will had four pages worth of important guests that needed to be invited to the wedding. Vic and Ellie had one page of guests.

questions.text: When Josh went to see Toby, did Toby buzz him into the building?
questions.explanation:
No.

	CJ couldn't go see Toby because of the investigation so Josh went to go see him, but Toby wouldn't buzz him in. A woman that was coming out of the building let Josh inside. While Josh was there, they argued over Santos being a good choice for President.

questions.text: Which country did Kate tell CJ was trying to build an oil pipeline to China?
questions.explanation:
Kazakhstan.

	Kazakhstan threw out the Russian group and called off plans for the pipeline. Kate was afraid that it was going to cause a war between the two countries.

questions.text: Which publishing company did Toby say offered him a book deal?
questions.explanation:
Simon and Schuster.

	Toby told Josh that he might take the book deal because he'll need the money.
